notes.text:
This update for nginx fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2021-23017: nginx DNS resolver off-by-one heap write (bsc#1186126)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: A security issue in nginx resolver was identified, which might allow an attacker who is able to forge UDP packets from the DNS server to cause 1-byte memory overwrite, resulting in worker process crash or potential other impact.
notes.title: CVE description
